title: Competition Winning, 1st Place -- Big Data Analytics w/Spark: Wearable Stress and Affect Detection
description: This project won 1st place out of 27 groups for a Big Data Analytics Course at UCSD. The project uses Spark to explore robust time-series data to predict participants affective states based on their wearable (chest/wrist sensor) data.

title: Converging Paths: An Exploration of Gender Differences in Education and the Life Path
description: Explores gamified data experience exploring World Bank Data for the years 1970-2020 highlighting gender differences in education across regions.

title: Frontiers Psychology: A Contactless Method for Measuring Full-Day, Naturalistic Motor Behavior Using Wearable Inertial Sensors
description: Here, we introduce and validate an alternative method that uses machine learning algorithms to classify infants' body position from a set of wearable inertial sensors.

title: San Diego County Behavioral Health Outcomes 2022 Analysis
description: This is a comprehensive project conducted in Fall of 2024, exploring an open source data set of behavioral health outcomes in San Diego county from the year 2022. In the project I show, data cleaning, data visualization, and k-nearest machine learning methods.

title: Personalized Skincare Product Visual
description: A dynamic visual graphic using a cosmetic sephora dataset. Users can filter for product type, skin-type and cost range to explore products sold in Sephora.

title: Chapter 55: Geriatric Psychiatry -- 55.6h Technology for Seniors
description: Exploring aging and technological advancements to support seniors mental health and well-being in a book chapter for Kaplan and Sadockâ€™s Comprehensive Textbook of Psychiatry, 11th edition (2025).

title: Mobile Affect Coding
description: Digital health; Ecological momentary assessment; Facial affect recognition; Mobile cognitive testing; Serious mental illness; Social motivation

title: Geospatial Visual Lab
description: Lab for DSC209R highlighting geospatial visualizations assessing biking commuter data using D3 and Mapbox API.

title: Suicide Research Symposium| Safety Plan Recall Poster
description: Understanding safety plan recall among adults with serious mental illness [Poster accepted]. Suicide Research Symposium, virtual.

title: Springer Journal | Psychiatric Correlates and Effects of Brief Intervention
description: Suicide safety plan self-knowledge in serious mental illness: psychiatric symptom correlates and effects of brief intervention [Accepted].

title: Deceptive vs. Persuasive Visualization Project
description: An analysis of using deceptive vs. persuasive design assessing abortion care data in the United States.
